channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 35c49d44-ccc1-4b18-8267-cfb3bacdd396
Display name: Storage DataShare Contributor
Description: Allows creating and managing storage dataShares to share data from storage accounts in-place. This role is in preview and subject to change.
Link: https://management.azure.com/35c49d44-ccc1-4b18-8267-cfb3bacdd396?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 46023a6a-0702-4cbf-956c-d8c3ac27bc2b
Display name: Defender CSPM
Description: Grants permissions for Microsoft Defender for Cloud CSPM base plan features
Link: https://management.azure.com/46023a6a-0702-4cbf-956c-d8c3ac27bc2b?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 5d9bac3f-34b2-432f-bde5-78aa8e73ce6b
Display name: Storage File Data SMB Take Ownership
Description: Allows end user to assume ownership of a file/directory
Link: https://management.azure.com/5d9bac3f-34b2-432f-bde5-78aa8e73ce6b?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 9d819e60-1b9f-4871-b492-4e6cdee0b50a
Display name: Storage Connector Contributor
Description: Allows creating and managing storage connectors to access remote data sources in-place in a storage account. This role is in preview and subject to change.
Link: https://management.azure.com/9d819e60-1b9f-4871-b492-4e6cdee0b50a?api-version=2022-04-01
